text: Italian Secondary School in Rijeka (; ) is a public high school in the city of Rijeka in Croatia. The school was established in 1888 and been in operation continuously since then. The school building is protected as a cultural heritage. Building was renovated in the period from 2006 to 2008 with support of City of Rijeka and Primorje-Gorski Kotar County. ==See also== * Italians of Croatia * Kantakuzina Katarina Branković Serbian Orthodox Secondary School * Education in Croatia ==References== Category:Secondary schools in Croatia Category:Minority schools Category:Education in Rijeka Category:Educational institutions established in 1888 Category:Italians of Croatia Category:Buildings and structures in Rijeka Category:International schools in Croatia Category:Organizations based in Rijeka
title: Italian Secondary School in Rijeka
